name: Terrain Tour
description:
This is a small game I quickly put together in Unity where I was experimenting with the Unity terrain system. You can fly around a small terrain I made with WASD and float up and down with Space and Shift. Finally, you can press Escape to pause the game.

Links to some assets I downloaded for the project.

  •  Music: Envato For Nature
  • Textures: AmbientCG
